mapper.select: with a as( select mku.*,sum(mkpro.mkprduration) as learn from mk_use mku left join mk_process mkpro on mku.mkuid=mkpro.mkuid group by mku.mkuid), b as( select mku.mkuid,count(mkccs.mkucid) as follor from mk_use mku left join mk_userconcerns mkccs on mku.mkuid=mkccs.mkucid group by mku.mkuid) select a.*,b.follor from a inner join b on a.mkuid=b.mkuid where a.mkuid=#{param1}

select a.*,count(mkcsid) countnode from( select mkc.mkcsid,mkc.mkctitle,mkc.mkcimg,mkc.mkcmoney,mkn.* from mk_note mkn left join mk_use mku on mkn.mkuid=mku.mkuid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkn.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mkc on mkss.mkcsid=mkc.mkcsid where mkn.mkuid=#{param1} order by mkn.mknctime desc )a where mkcmoney=0 group by mkcsid

select a.*,count(mkcsid) countnode from( select mkc.mkcsid,mkc.mkctitle,mkc.mkcimg,mkc.mkcmoney,mkn.* from mk_note mkn left join mk_use mku on mkn.mkuid=mku.mkuid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkn.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mkc on mkss.mkcsid=mkc.mkcsid where mkn.mkuid=#{param1} order by mkn.mknctime desc )a where mkcmoney!=0 group by mkcsid

with a as ( select mkp.mkprid,mkp.mkuid,mkp.mkpsrarus,mkprduration,mkc.mkcimg,mkc.mkctitle,mkss.mkcsname,mkc.mkcsid,mkss.mkcstid,mkc.mkcmoney from mk_process mkp left join mk_use mk on mkp.mkuid=mk.mkuid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkp.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mkc on mkss.mkcsid=mkc.mkcsid where mkp.mkuid=#{param1} and mkp.mkprid in( select max(mkp.mkprid) from mk_process mkp left join mk_use mk on mkp.mkuid=mk.mkuid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkp.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mkc on mkss.mkcsid=mkc.mkcsid where mkp.mkuid=#{param1} group by mkc.mkcsid )), b as ( select mc.mkcsid,count(mn.mkcstid) notenum from mk_process mkp left join mk_note mn on mn.mkcstid=mkp.mkcstid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mn.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mc on mkss.mkcsid=mc.mkcsid where mn.mkuid=#{param1} group by mkp.mkcstid ), c as ( select mc.mkcsid,mn.mkatpid,count(mn.mkcstid) asknum from mk_process mkp left join mk_asktopic mn on mn.mkcstid=mkp.mkcstid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mn.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mc on mkss.mkcsid=mc.mkcsid where mn.mkuid=#{param1} group by mkp.mkcstid ) select a.*,b.notenum,c.asknum,c.mkatpid from a left join b on a.mkcsid=b.mkcsid left join c on a.mkcsid=c.mkcsid

with a as ( select mkp.mkprid,mkp.mkuid,mkp.mkpsrarus,mkprduration,mkc.mkcimg,mkc.mkctitle,mkss.mkcsname,mkc.mkcsid,mkss.mkcstid,mkc.mkcmoney from mk_process mkp left join mk_use mk on mkp.mkuid=mk.mkuid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkp.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mkc on mkss.mkcsid=mkc.mkcsid where mkp.mkuid=#{param1} and mkp.mkprid in( select max(mkp.mkprid) from mk_process mkp left join mk_use mk on mkp.mkuid=mk.mkuid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkp.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mkc on mkss.mkcsid=mkc.mkcsid where mkp.mkuid=#{param1} group by mkc.mkcsid )), b as ( select mc.mkcsid,count(mn.mkcstid) notenum from mk_process mkp left join mk_note mn on mn.mkcstid=mkp.mkcstid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mn.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mc on mkss.mkcsid=mc.mkcsid where mn.mkuid=#{param1} group by mkp.mkcstid ), c as ( select mc.mkcsid,mn.mkatpid,count(mn.mkcstid) asknum from mk_process mkp left join mk_asktopic mn on mn.mkcstid=mkp.mkcstid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mn.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mc on mkss.mkcsid=mc.mkcsid where mn.mkuid=#{param1} group by mkp.mkcstid ) select a.*,b.notenum,c.asknum,c.mkatpid from a left join b on a.mkcsid=b.mkcsid left join c on a.mkcsid=c.mkcsid where a.mkcmoney != 0

with a as ( select mkp.mkprid,mkp.mkuid,mkprduration,mkp.mkdate,mkc.mkcimg,mkc.mkctitle,mkss.mkcsname,mkc.mkcsid,mkss.mkcstid,mkc.mkcmoney from mk_process mkp left join mk_use mk on mkp.mkuid=mk.mkuid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkp.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mkc on mkss.mkcsid=mkc.mkcsid where mkp.mkuid=#{param1} and mkp.mkprid in( select max(mkp.mkprid) from mk_process mkp left join mk_use mk on mkp.mkuid=mk.mkuid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkp.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mkc on mkss.mkcsid=mkc.mkcsid where mkp.mkuid=#{param1} group by mkc.mkcsid )), b as ( select mc.mkcsid,count(mn.mkcstid) notenum from mk_process mkp left join mk_note mn on mn.mkcstid=mkp.mkcstid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mn.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mc on mkss.mkcsid=mc.mkcsid where mn.mkuid=#{param1} group by mkp.mkcstid ), c as ( select mc.mkcsid,mn.mkatpid,count(mn.mkcstid) asknum from mk_process mkp left join mk_asktopic mn on mn.mkcstid=mkp.mkcstid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mn.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mc on mkss.mkcsid=mc.mkcsid where mn.mkuid=#{param1} group by mkp.mkcstid ) select a.*,b.notenum,c.asknum,c.mkatpid from a left join b on a.mkcsid=b.mkcsid left join c on a.mkcsid=c.mkcsid where a.mkcmoney = 0

with a as( select mkc.mkcsid,mkc.mkctitle,mkss.mkcstid,mkss.mkcsname,mkn.mkuid,mkn.mknotecontent,mkn.mknid,mkn.mknctime from mk_note mkn left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkn.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mkc on mkss.mkcsid=mkc.mkcsid order by mkn.mknctime desc), b as(select mkn.mknid,count(mkf.mknid) fabcount from mk_note mkn left join mk_fabulous mkf on mkn.mknid=mkf.mknid group by mkn.mknid) select a.*,b.fabcount from a left join b on a.mknid=b.mknid where a.mkuid=#{param1} order by mknctime desc

with a as(select mkc.*,count(mksc.mkuid) asktopic from mk_course mkc left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkc.mkcsid=mkss.mkcsid left join mk_asktopic mksc on mkss.mkcstid=mksc.mkcstid where mkc.mkcsid=#{param1} and mksc.mkuid=#{param2} group by mkc.mkcsid), b as( select mkc.*,count(mkawc.mkuid) answtop from mk_course mkc left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkc.mkcsid=mkss.mkcsid left join mk_asktopic mksc on mkss.mkcstid=mksc.mkcstid left join mk_answertopic mkawc on mksc.mkatpid=mkawc.mkatpid where mkc.mkcsid=#{param1} and mkawc.mkuid=#{param2} group by mkc.mkcsid ) select a.*,b.answtop from a inner join b on a.mkcsid=b.mkcsid
select * from mk_course mkc left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkc.mkcsid=mkss.mkcsid left join mk_asktopic mksc on mkss.mkcstid=mksc.mkcstid where mkc.mkcsid=#{param1} group by mkc.mkcsid
